translations: 测（光）密度术；显微测密术

sentences.sentence: Densitometry was used to calculate peak particle diameters.
sentences.translation: 使用密度计去推算粒孚的最大直径。

sentences.sentence: Of those exposed to inhaled corticosteroids, 23% of women and 4% of men underwent bone densitometry.
sentences.translation: 在接受吸入皮质类固醇的人中，23%的女性及4%的男性经历骨密度测定。

sentences.sentence: Graphic technology - Graphic arts reflection densitometry measurements - Terminology, equations, image elements and procedures.
sentences.translation: 图形技术。图形工艺反射光密度测量。术语、公式、图象元素和程序。
